name: Wind Chimes Studio
address: Unit 501, 07 Nguyen Khac Can, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in the Hoan Kiem district in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment is 100 metres from Ba Dinh Square. Hoan Kiem Lake is 300 metres from the apartment. Guests benefit from balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Fitted with air-conditioning, this studio has a seating area with a cable TV, dining area and a kitchen complete with a microwave and a fridge. Bathroom has shower facilities.

Hanoi Opera House is 200 metres from Wind Chimes Studio, while Trang Tien Plaza is 300 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
